Posts.Content: Feb 2, 2009 11:52AM sammyjo wrote: Thank you everyone!!!Â  I had a bi lat mastectomy with tissue expanders Oct 08 was catheterized for 36 afterwards and found it very uncomfortable. I had my expanders removed 3 weeks ago because my wounds would not heal due to necrosis and seroma in both sides. Next op is for implants and breast lift my p.s said this will take 3-4 hours because of pocket work needed and lift. I expect to feel o.k afterwards as this is not a big surgery just a lengthly one so maybe will escape catheter, here's hoping!!
Posts.Title: silly question sammyjo ssyoung

Posts.Content: sammyjo wrote: When I had my mastectomy during prep for surgery I had catheter inserted for urine collection, surgery was 6 hours long, did not have one on having expanders removed as this was short procedure. My p.s said my next surgery will be approx 3-4 hours long, will I need to have this again, this is something I found very uncomfortable. Sorry if this sounds silly!!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: silly question sammyjo ssyoung
